page.title: 19BBC Radio Cornwall.
page.content: Last term our class visited{Radio Cornwall.Our teacher,{Miss Maddern, had organised a project on {Communication}and we wrote to the presenter of "Three 'til Tea"His name is{Duncan Warren.}He invited the whole class to go up to{Radio Cornwall}and to appear on his show. Lisa Waters wrote the first letter so she talked on the show about our project. A lot of others,including Miss Maddern,also appeared on the programme.Radio Cornwall has the{biggest audience}of any{radio station}in England.It broadcasts news,information,{weather {reports}and{record}programmes.They have a lot of{useful information}about roadworks and difficult road conditions like wide loads.They also have weather reports for sailors and fishermen which are very helpful .
